amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. __. The amount otherwise made available by this Act for "Department of Energy--Energy Programs--Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy" is hereby reduced to $0.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 81 printed in the Congressional Record to strike the funds made available for the the Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy account under the Department of Energy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A065) Failed by recorded vote: 69 - 354 (Roll no. 591).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A065) Failed by recorded vote: 69 - 354 (Roll no. 591).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A065) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
